thread.title: Ariana Grande Teases New Single 'Focus' With Lyrics
thread.title_full: Ariana Grande Teases New Single 'Focus' With Lyrics

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Ariana Grande Teases New Single 'Focus' With Lyrics
text:
Comments The former Nickelodeon star shares on Twitter the handwritten lyrics of 'Focus' 30 days before she releases the song. 
Ariana Grande has exactly one month before she releases her new single "Focus". On Wednesday, September 30, the 22-year-old singer started promoting the song by sharing on Twitter a picture of what appears to be its lyrics. Written on a notebook, the handwritten lyrics read, "I know what I came to do, and that ain't gonna change/ So go ahead and talk ya talk cause I won't take the bait!" The former Nickelodeon star simply captioned the post, "30 Days #focus." — Ariana Grande (@ArianaGrande) September 30, 2015 "Focus" was written by Grande along with Ilya Salmanzadeh, Savan Kotecha and Peter Svenssonwill, the same people behind her 2014 hit "Love Me Harder". The upcoming track will lead the pint-sized diva's upcoming third album, " Moonlight ". Still having no exact release date, the project will come as a follow-up to 2013's " Yours Truly " and 2014's " My Everything " which both debuted at No. 1 on Billboard 200. 
© AceShowbiz.com
